Italy's defence minister hospitalised with suspected pericarditisItalian Defence Minister Guido Crosetto was hospitalised with suspected pericarditis in Rome overnight, his ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 07:40:30 GMT HAO6YTAODVKETPUBFWMN2YZVPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italys-defence-minister-hospitalized-suspected-pericarditis-2024-02-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine says Russia buying Starlink terminals in 'Arab countries'Russian forces are buying Starlink satellite internet terminals in "Arab countries" for use on the battlefield, Ukraine's military spy agency said on Tuesday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 07:20:32 GMT NLFAU6Q47JMWVIPAYP26D5NID4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-military-intelligence-says-Russia-buying-starlink-terminals-arab-2024-02-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Hundreds of thousands lose power in Australia after weather downs power linesLarge chunks of Australia's Victoria state lost power on Tuesday afternoon when a major power plant shut down because a storm knocked out parts of the state's electricity transmission network. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:51:16 GMT YRZFMXEHENLLRD5WZ3RK3LBWTE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hundreds-thousands-lose-power-australia-after-weather-downs-power-lines-2024-02-13/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Port of Antwerp disrupted by Belgian farmers' protestsAntwerp, one of Europe's biggest ports, said on Tuesday that there was disruption at the site due to protests from Belgian farmers - the latest in a series of European-wide demonstrations from farmers demanding better pay and working conditions. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:42:40 GMT SR5QHHKVKFMF7G64X7OGH7SWN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/port-antwerp-disrupted-by-belgian-farmers-protests-2024-02-13/Reuters世界欧洲
US Senate heads toward final passage of Ukraine aid billThe Democratic-led U.S. Senate was expected to vote early on Tuesday for final passage of a $95.34 billion aid package for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan, amid growing doubts about the legislation's fate in the Republican-controlled House of Representatives. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:32:30 GMT CSVZ3OGGPZPLDJJJWX7ZECYUCA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-heads-toward-final-passage-ukraine-aid-bill-2024-02-13/David Morgan世界美国
Papua New Guinea PM to face no confidence motion in parliament after deadly riotsPapua New Guinea's opposition party lodged a motion of no confidence in Prime Minister James Marape when the Pacific Island nation's parliament returned on Tuesday, the first session since deadly riots in January during a police strike. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:28:18 GMT 6JWBGJK5BZNRTE5DJTJBZWHUH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/papua-new-guinea-pm-face-no-confidence-motion-parliament-after-deadly-riots-2024-02-13/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Thai journalists arrested for news coverage of anarchist graffiti on templeTwo Thai journalists have been arrested for their story about an activist spray painting an anarchist symbol and a symbol critical of "lese majeste" laws on a Bangkok temple wall almost a year ago, the police and their lawyers said on Tuesday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:41:54 GMT CNJTVY2OKRO3BK42A52MXAGMTM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-journalists-arrested-news-coverage-anarchist-graffiti-temple-2024-02-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indian farmers to march to Delhi after talks with ministers failIndian farmers plan to continue a protest march to New Delhi on Tuesday after talks with ministers failed to make progress on issues including better crop prices promised in 2021 when thousands camped on highways leading to the capital. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:26:23 GMT PM3RE6LW7ZOZVHXFQFWECKPMUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-farmers-march-delhi-after-talks-with-ministers-fail-2024-02-13/Reuters世界印度
Three COP summit hosts unite to raise climate ambitionsThe United Arab Emirates, host of last year's COP28 climate summit, and Azerbaijan and Brazil, the hosts of the next two U.N. climate summits, said on Tuesday they would team up to push for more ambitious emissions-cutting goals. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:09:34 GMT 3AML3E7K6JJIJCE7UDT77GOA3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/third-cop-summit-hosts-unite-raise-climate-ambitions-2024-02-13/Kate Abnett可持续发展气候与能源
Indonesia in final stretch ahead of world's biggest single-day electionAuthorities making final preparations ahead of Wednesday's election, with around 25,000 police set to ensure security in a contest seen as a test of democratic gains since the end of authoritarian rule. Jailed former Thai leader Thaksin granted parole, PM saysThailand's controversial billionaire former premier Thaksin Shinawatra has been granted parole after serving six months in detention, the prime minister said Tuesday, while highlighting his service to the country.
